description:
Poise provides discreet protection against bladder leakage with 3in1 protection that a period pad can't provide.

Poise Overnight Pads for Bladder Leaks offer discreet protection against heavy bladder leakage. Providing additional coverage to period pads, they absorb bladder leaks commonly experienced unexpected and overnight. Experience Poise 3 in 1 Bladder Protection to enjoy comfort, dryness and odour control. You've got Poise to keep you feeling feminine, confident and in control.

3-in-1 Bladder Protection Comfort, Dryness and Odour Control

Trusted and reliable LBL protection 8 layerdesign quickly absorbs and locks away wetness into the super absorbent ABSORB-LOC core.

Ultimate dryness and freshness Soft, quick dry cover keeps you dry and comfortable all day. Change as required.

Odour Control Instantly and continuouslyneutralisesodours through the Absorb-Loc core

2x more absorbent than leading period pads So you remain protected to feel feminine, confident and in control

All day comfort and security Hourglass shaped pad conforms to natural curves of body.

Holds up to 2 cups of liquid
name: Poise Pads For Bladder Leaks Overnight 8 Pack
